meanings.definition: The quality or state of being centered or focused around a particular point or axis.
meanings.sent1: The centricities of the artwork drew attention to the main character.
meanings.sent2: Her centricities in the discussion always revolve around fairness.
meanings.sent3: The party's centricities on snacks made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His centricities in leadership were like a guiding star for the team.
meanings.sent5: The centricities of the compass pointed us in the right direction.

meanings.definition: The tendency to prioritize or focus on a central theme or idea.
meanings.sent1: The centricities of his writing always center on love and loss.
meanings.sent2: She has centricities in her work that make her stand out.
meanings.sent3: The cat's centricities on chasing shadows entertained us all.
meanings.sent4: His centricities in storytelling were like a magnet for listeners.
meanings.sent5: The centricities of the movie kept us engaged till the end.
